messages.title: On your side in Oxford West & Abingdon
messages.content: About Sally: Sally Copley is a local, working mum with 20 years experience of leading successful national campaigns with others to make a difference. She works hard to speak to people across the constituency, offering a positive message of Labour's plan to invest in our NHS, reduce the cost of living, increase wages and regulate zero-hours contracts. In her professional life, Sally has made a real difference; winning the introduction of a national minimum wage for apprentices across the UK and making sure the government does much more to tackle tax dodging.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will secure the future of our NHS with 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 extra GPs, funded with a clamp down on tax avoidance, a levy on tobacco firms and a Mansion Tax on properties worth over £2m.
Labour will tackle the housing crisis by building 200,000 new homes per year by 2020 to help families and professionals find decent homes.
Sally supports campaigns for local people to earn the Living Wage across Oxford West & Abingdon.

issues.health: Labour's plan to invest in our NHS

housing.content: Labour will build 200,000 new homes per year by 2020 to tackle the housing crisis, and provide decent homes for families and professionals.

politicalExperience.role: Working mum with 20 years experience of leading successful national campaigns
politicalExperience.achievements: Introduction of a national minimum wage for apprentices across the UK and tackling tax dodging.

contactInformation.address: Unit A, Bishop's Mews, Transport Way, Oxford, OX4 6HD

endorsements.endorsement: She will make a fantastic MP for our area and would be lucky to have her representing us.
An excellent representative and a superb Member of Parliament.
Sally will help make Britain a fairer place.

images.caption: Sally Copley holding a 'Vote Labour' sign.
